articles.contents: Elon Musk confirmed xAI purchased five additional 380MW natural gas turbines to power AI infrastructure, with the first two deliveries expected by end of 2026. The turbines will support a 600,000+ Nvidia GB200-equivalent GPU cluster for the AI startup's computational needs.

articles.contents: ChatGPT's daily web visits declined 22% over six weeks to approximately 158 million, while Google's Gemini held steady at around 60 million visitors. Gemini now commands roughly 40% of ChatGPT's traffic following the launch of Gemini 3.
